opt

Interface OptimizationProblem

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GeneticAlgorithmProblem, HillClimbingProblem, ProbabilisticOptimizationProblem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericGeneticAlgorithmProblem, GenericHillClimbingProblem, GenericOptimizationProblem, GenericProbabilisticOptimizationProblem, NeuralNetworkOptimizationProblem

    public interface OptimizationProblem
    A class representing an optimization problem.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
